error.missingPerm: I don't have permission to remove roles or the role you gave have higher rank than me

init.error: An error occurred while creating roles! Most likely, I don't have permission to manage roles.
init.warning: This server already has all the colorful roles

cleanup.error: An error occurred while deleting roles! Most likely, I don't have permission to manage roles.
cleanup.warning: This server has no colorful roles

error.notFound: No color named `%s` found, check `%s color list`
error.notAssigned: An error occurred while assigning role! Most likely, I don't have permission to manage roles.
error.notRoleFound: The color is correct but no role found. Ask the administration to use the `%s color init` command

warning.alreadyOwns: Your nickname already has a `%s` color

remove.success: Your nick no longer has a color
remove.warning: You don't have a colored nick

add.success: The %s role has been successfully added to the default roles

error.roleDuplicate: The %s role is already added to the default roles
error.tooMany: You cannot set more than 10 default roles

remove.success: The %s role is no longer the default role
remove.error: The %s role wasn't the default role

error.numberRange: The number of messages to delete must be between 1-100
